title: Ghastly Tales of Gaiety and Greed
description: Coasters, carousels, an old cemetery, and sprawling hotel on a stormy lakeside. Visit this haunted tour of scrapbook memories where legendary summers intersect with history and rumor. Told in vignettes that weave stories, newspaper clippings, postcards, and images, Ghastly Tales follows four families through the decades at a lakeside resort and amusement park where everyone eventually returns.
author: E.F. Schraeder
